product_name: The North Face Nuptse Fur II Boots - Girls'
long_description: Made by The North Face, these Nuptse Fur II winter boots supply cozy warmth and fun style for cold-weather romping and everyday adventures around town. Coated recycled PET ripstop nylon uppers are durable, flexible and water-resistant; abrasion-resistant rands protect uppers and feet. Plush faux fur linings offer warmth and softness for cold feet; fur spills onto the cuff and lace area for added style. 500-fill-power goose down insulation provides excellent warmth without undo bulkiness. Compression-molded EVA midsoles absorb shock for all-day comfort. Nylon shanks deliver torsional stability and help reduce cold temperature conductivity. TNF Winter Grip(TM) rubber outsoles supply tenacious traction in wet, slick conditions; omnidirectional lugs are both grippy and self-cleaning.
short_description: Made by The North Face, these Nuptse Fur II winter boots supply cozy warmth and fun style for cold-weather romping and everyday adventures around town.
